summary: TRUCK KEPT OVERHEATING BUT IT WAS NEVER DISPLAYED ON GAUGE OF OVER HEATING.THE COOLANT WAS FLUSHED AND REPLACED. A WEEK LATER THE TRUCK STALLED ON THE INTERSTATE AND WOULD NOT RUN. IT WOULD TURN ON BUT THE ENGINE WOULD SOUND REALLY LOUD AND THE TRUCK AND STEERING WHEEL WOULD BE TREMBLING. IT WAS TOWED TO A MECHANIC AND HE CLAIMS THAT IT WOULD NEED A NEW ENGINE. THE OVER HEATING CAUSED A ROD TO BREAK. THE TRUCK ON HAS 107,000 MILES. *TR
